ResourceHeader.Description: Basic parameters with 5 min resolution observed by EISCAT ESR radar at Longyearbyen
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: These data are the intellectual property of the EISCAT Scientific Association. They may be freely used for the purpose of illustration for teaching and for non-commercial scientific research, provided that the source is acknowledged and to the extent justified by the non-commercial purpose to be achieved. Substantial use of these data should be discussed at an early stage with knowledgeable scientists within the EISCAT Scientific Association (EISCAT's Headquarters, enquires [at] eiscat.se, can provide advice on suitable contacts) in order to clarify matters of use, calibration and potential co-authorship. Any further distribution of these data, including installation in any database, must be accompanied by this statement and subject to the same conditions of use.

Parameter.Name: st._UT
Parameter.Description: Start time of observation of a beam in HHMMSS

Parameter.Name: end_UT
Parameter.Description: End time of observation of a beam in HHMMSS

Parameter.Name: alt
Parameter.Description: Altitude of a gate in km

Parameter.Name: lat
Parameter.Description: Geographical latitude of a gate in deg

Parameter.Name: lon
Parameter.Description: Geographical longitude of a gate in deg

Parameter.Name: Neerr
Parameter.Description: Error of electron number density in m^-3

Parameter.Name: Vierr
Parameter.Description: Error of ion velocity in m/s

Parameter.Name: Tierr
Parameter.Description: Error of ion temperature in K

Parameter.Name: Teerr
Parameter.Description: Error of electron temperature in K

Parameter.Name: Az
Parameter.Description: Azimuth angle of a beam in deg

Parameter.Name: El
Parameter.Description: Elevation angle of a beam in deg

Parameter.Name: O+/Ne
Parameter.Description: Ratio of O+ number density to Ne number density in 1e-3
